structure.unit: PAYMENT, COLLECTION, AND REFUND OF TAXES

law.history: Repealed 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 10, sec. 71, effective January 1, 2010. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 262, effective June 20, 2005. -- Repealed and reenacted 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. V, sec. 348, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 149, effective January 2, 1978. -- Amended 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 186, Art. I, sec. 27. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4143.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Report and payment to Department of Revenue -- Penalty.
